ISSUE.TITLE: Complete the Petclinic OpenAPI spec
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: All REST endpoints of this Petclinic sample are not described into the [openapi.yml](https://github.com/spring-petclinic/spring-petclinic-rest/blob/master/src/main/resources/openapi.yml) spec file: POST `/vets`, PUT `/vets/{vetId}`, DELETE `/owners/{ownerId}` and so on. This issue aims to complete it. Spring MVC controllers has not be updated in order to override methods that will be added to the generated interfaces (ie. `OwnersApi`, `VetsApi`)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #70 from spring-petclinic/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/url-parse-1.5.3 Bump url-parse from 1.5.1 to 1.5.3

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #69 from spring-petclinic/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/jszip-3.7.1 Bump jszip from 3.6.0 to 3.7.1
